features.html:
Advertisement by Aeroflot, a Soviet State-Owned Commercial Airline. The Advertisement Was Used in the Soviet Union During the 1950s.

Shawshots/ Alamy Stock Photo

 

The image shows a commercial jetliner flying over major landmarks from America, Europe, Africa, and Asia.
